summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1524, for the improvement of Carr Place, in the City of Seattle, from the south line produced of block 40, Lake Union Addition to the City of Seattle to North 39th Street by grading and curbing under Ordinance No. 16467 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
